statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 1001;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE labor_hours > 5;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM MaintenanceSchedule GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT maintenance_date, SUM(labor_hours) AS total_labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedule GROUP BY maintenance_date ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 100 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, labor_hours ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY labor_hours DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND labor_hours > 5.00 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%regular%' OR maintenance_type LIKE '%annual%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, SUM(labor_hours) AS total_labor_hours FROM MaintenanceSchedule GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING total_labor_hours > 20.00 ORDER BY total_labor_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_History
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM Maintenance_History WHERE equipment_id = 1001
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_History ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM Maintenance_History
SELECT equipment_name, install_date, manufacturer FROM Equipment_Details
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_History WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM Maintenance_History JOIN Equipment_Details ON Maintenance_History.equipment_id = Equipment_Details.equipment_id WHERE Equipment_Details.manufacturer = 'ABC Company';

SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, maintenance_cost FROM Maintenance_History JOIN Equipment_Details ON Maintenance_History.equipment_id = Equipment_Details.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_cost > 5000 ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Maintenance_History WHERE equipment_id = 1001 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM Maintenance_History JOIN Equipment_Details ON Maintenance_History.equipment_id = Equipment_Details.equipment_id GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_maintenance > 10 ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteToEnergyEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, installation_date FROM WasteToEnergyEquipment WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_interval FROM WasteToEnergyEquipment WHERE maintenance_interval = '1 month';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, installation_date FROM WasteToEnergyEquipment WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, installation_date, maintenance_interval FROM WasteToEnergyEquipment WHERE maintenance_interval > INTERVAL '30 days';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, next_maintenance_date, scheduled_by_user FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT WH.*, MS.scheduled_by_user FROM WasteToEnergyEquipment WH INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule MS ON WH.equipment_id = MS.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_result FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE equipment_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT equipment_name, log_date, log_details FROM Equipment INNER JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, scheduled_date, status FROM Equipment INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Maintenance_Log ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_logs FROM Maintenance_Log GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, start_date FROM Maintenance_Schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Equipment
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, next_maintenance_date FROM Maintenance_Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 2

SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(history_id) AS total_maintenance FROM Maintenance_Equipment LEFT JOIN Maintenance_History ON Maintenance_Equipment.equipment_id = Maintenance_History.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM Maintenance_Log INNER JOIN Maintenance_Cost ON Maintenance_Log.log_id = Maintenance_Cost.log_id
